critique: This document pertains to a minor administrative change within the Department of Agriculture, specifically regarding the appointment of meteorological observers. It seems to create an exception to civil service rules for part-time weather observers making less than $100/month, subject to agreement between the Department of Agriculture and the Civil Service Commission. It also requires reporting of appointments to the Civil Service Commission. There's no clear indication of ideological bias, immigration stance, executive power shift, or impact on national security vs. civil liberties. It has a very slight deregulation effect by creating an exception to civil service rules, and no impact on social inclusion or federalism.
